participant_1.name: Alex Mercer
participant_1.personality: Introverted yet creative, Alex has a vivid imagination and prefers to express themselves through technology and gaming.
participant_1.background: i am a famous twitch streamer. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm a recluse. i've an allergy to water. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double.

participant_2.name: Jamie Collins
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and determined, Jamie has a passion for music and dreams of sharing her voice with the world.
participant_2.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music.
